articles.description: Sachin Tendulkar has termed playing under Aunshuman Gaekwad as some of the 'better years' of his cricketing career and that the former India coach was someone who could always be trusted.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Sunil Gavaskar and Anshuman Gaekwad are all ears as Sachin Tendulkar speaks the the launch of Gaekwad’s biography ‘Guts Amidst Bloodbath’ in Mumbai on Friday.

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Shocking to see where we stand in points table’: Samson after RR beat PBKS - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sanju Samson was "shocked to see" RR stand in fifth position in the IPL 2023 points table. They will be knocked out if RCB win their last league match. | Cricket
articles.content: With Jos Buttler, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Shimron Heymyer, Trent Boult, Yuzvendra Chahal and Ravichandran Ashwin in their ranks, Rajasthan Royals really should not have been struggling to fin… [+2693 chars]

articles.title: Elena Rybakina mysteriously signals chair umpire to address Jelena Ostapenko after frosty net exchange in Italian Open SF - Sportskeeda
